DOC.brief_summary: A direct comparison Positron Emission Tomography ( PET ) ( 11C-Raclopride ) Single Photon Emission Computed Tomography ( SPECT ) ( 123I-IBZM ) D2 RO measurement would allow GSK gain understand SPECT result obtain SB773812 , accurately interpret future D2 RO result either PET SPECT study new compound .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Compare Two Different Brain Imaging Techniques Healthy Volunteers Schizophrenic Patients
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : Not pregnant become pregnant study . No abnormality clinical examination , clinical laboratory test ECG . Not take drug Patients schizophrenia , schizophreniform disorder schizoaffective disorder . Patients least 1 month antipsychotic monotherapy either risperidone , olanzapine clozapine . Healthy volunteer neurological psychiatric illness . Exclusion criterion : Have receive antipsychotic last month neuroleptic last year . If take part investigation receive radiation dose 10 mSv 3 year period . History bleed disorder take medication affect blood clot History substance dependence ( except nicotine ) Claustrophobia Gross head deformity . Unable lie still PET SPECT camera 1 hour half . The presence cardiac pacemaker electronic device ferromagnetic metal foreign body .
